entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Periods of rain beginning overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
